subject: Dear Beloved
mailbody:
My Beloved In The Lord.

My name is Mrs Margret Nelson, I am a dying woman who had decided to
donate what I have to the Charities. I am 85 years old and was
diagnosed for cancer about four years ago, immediately after the death
of my husband; I have been touched to donate from what I have
inherited from my late husband for the good work rather than allow his
relatives to use my husband's hard earned fund.

As I lay on the sick bed, I want you to help me in carrying out my
last wish on earth which will be very profitable to you. I want to
WILL a total sum of $5.5 million USD to you which I want you to
distribute part of it to any charity home for me and the rest for
yourself and your family which I will inform you on how to share all,
please for further information contact me ASAP.

Please reply with my private email address. margretnelson@gmail.co.za

Best Regards,
Mrs Margret Nelson

subject: Re: Dear Beloved
mailbody:
01 Jul 2003, 02:35:26 AM 

 My friend i must tell the bank that due to the fact that you are clean of habit and reputation, untainted by any personal adventure with woman of a loose kind and with unimpeachable vimtos. Perhaps you would care to send details of any personality traits. 

 love 

 Perico
